A smart tape dispenser that can detect when it's running low on tape and automatically reorder from a connected device.
A tape dispenser that uses AI to suggest the best tape for a specific project or task, based on factors such as the surface being worked on and the desired finish.
A tape dispenser that can be controlled remotely using a smartphone app, allowing users to easily adjust the speed and direction of the tape as needed.
A tape dispenser that uses a built-in laser to cut the tape to the desired length, ensuring precision and accuracy.
A tape dispenser that has a built-in scanner, allowing users to scan and save the dimensions of a project for easy reference in the future.
